title: Haddo House Country Park Walks

images.title: JThomas / Haddo House
images.caption: View of the gardens and house. Haddo House is one of the most beautiful stately homes open to the public in Scotland.

images.title: Martyn Gorman / Redwoods at Haddo House.
images.caption: Redwoods at Haddo House. These two majestic redwoods were planted by Queen Victoria and Prince Albert when they visited Haddo House.

images.title: Sarah Charlesworth / Tree-lined approach to Haddo House
images.caption: Tree-lined approach to Haddo House

images.title: Martyn Gorman / Raxton farm, Haddo House, Aberdeenshire
images.caption: Raxton farm, Haddo House, Aberdeenshire. Autumn countryside after several days of heavy rain. The farm sits across the road from the entrance to the park.

description: Explore the beautiful estate of Haddo House on this lovely walk in Aberdeenshire. A number of footpaths will take you around the 100 hectare grounds where you will find a formal terrace garden, lakes, monuments, woodland and a deer park.
